document_data.name: Halls of Justice

document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|the building in [[Muluk]]|the temple to [[Tyr]]|Halls of Justice}}
The '''Halls of Justice''' was a government building located in [[Muluk]], the City of Kings, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The Halls of Justice were found near the center of Muluk.
document_data.Activities: This location served as the court of law, center for tax collection, center for all other governmental decisions for the city. Legal decisions made within the Halls of Justice could be appealed to the [[Caliph Aswiyah al-Muftahir|Caliph]] in the grand palace where she met with officials once per week.
